title: 1.4 Master Challenge 2
question: Write test cases for a program that calculates the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two numbers. Your test cases should include testing different numbers, different combinations of numbers (positive, negative, zero), and the accuracy of the calculation. Create the program, write at least five test cases, and verify them using the print statement.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
